name: Raikou
author: Ryo Ueda
flavor_text: It is said to have fallen with lightning. It can fire thunderbolts from the rain clouds on its back.

poke_power.name: Thunder Rumble
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), when you attach a {L} Energy card from your hand to Raikou, you may put 1 damage counter on 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Thunder Climb
attacks.effect: Discard 3 cards from the top of your deck. This attack does 50 damage plus 10 more damage for each {L} Energy card you discarded. Then, attach those {L} Energy cards to 1 of your Pokémon.
